mapper.select: select seq_cuso_idx.nextval ,cuso_order_state as cusoOrderState ,cuso_total_cost as cusoTotalCost ,cuso_phone as cusoPhone ,cuso_member_no as cusoMemberNo ,cuso_order_no as cusoOrderNo ,cuso_branch as cusoBranch ,cuso_order_date as cusoOrderDate from cusorder
mapper.insert: insert into cusorder values ( seq_cuso_idx.nextval, #{cusoOrderState}, #{cusoTotalCost}, #{cusoPhone}, #{cusoMemberNo}, #{cusoOrderNo}, #{cusoBranch}, sysdate )
